metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart is afraid of wolves due her belief that she was being chased by one in her childhood. When this fear is triggered by a wolf,
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Plays when Shadowheart is close to a wolf and she is still afraid of wolves.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.context: NodeContext: Fearful. Reacting to a wolf. Refers to a childhood encounter when she believes she was saved from a wolf by Shar worshippers (later, she may realise this was a lie and lose the phobia). Arc - SH is loyal to Shar.
